title: Textile

Medium: cotton, silk, wool
Technique: cross stitch on plain weave, bobbin lace
description: Rectangle of undyed cloth with a wide border of black wool lace on three sides and deep border of floral bands in black silk cross stitch with guard bands of black and white cutwork.
